meanings.definition: Resembling porcelain in appearance or texture.
meanings.sent1: The doll's face had a porcelainlike smoothness.
meanings.sent2: The teacup was delicate and porcelainlike.
meanings.sent3: The chef's cake was so porcelainlike, it looked too perfect to eat!
meanings.sent4: Her skin was as porcelainlike as a fragile vase.
meanings.sent5: The snow-covered landscape had a porcelainlike beauty under the moonlight.
